title: Application Lifecycle Bundle
description: Normalized package of design, integration, release, and operations artifacts for a single application or feature run.

application_id.description: Unique identifier for the application or feature.

version.description: Semantic or monotonic version for this assembled bundle.

assembled_at.description: Timestamp when the lifecycle bundle was produced.

description.description: Optional human-readable summary for the bundle.

links.description: Optional references to dashboards, documents, or pipelines relevant to the bundle.

design.description: Design-phase artifact bundle for the application run.

integration.description: Integration phase outputs and audit trail.

return_envelopes.description: Chronological list of implementor deliveries applied to the codebase.

reviews.description: Reviewer verdicts associated with the return envelopes.

handoff_events.description: Detailed orchestration handoff events captured during integration.

release.description: Release governance metadata for the bundle.

approved_by.description: Optional approver or authority for the release.

operations.description: Operational artifacts produced while executing the release.

db_changes.description: Database change envelopes tied to the release.

test_reports.description: Verification reports from executed test suites.

notes.description: Operational summary, incidents, or follow-up actions.

incidents.description: Incident identifiers or links captured during operations.

attachments.description: Supporting documents committed alongside the bundle.
